00090

00092     typedef typename T::ValueType ValueType;

00099       //SeparableMetric  model should have a F(Abscissa, Abscissa, InternalValueType) returing an InternalValueType
00100       ConceptUtils::sameType( h, myT.F(a,a,h) );
00101       //SeparableMetric  model should have a Sep(Abscissa,InternalValueType, Abscissa,InternalValueType) returing an ValueType  
00102       ConceptUtils::sameType( a, myT.Sep(a,h,a,h) );
00103     }
